quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to move south. And then, try to travel south. And then, go to the west. Then, try to go to the north. With that done, try to travel north. And then, venture north. After that, go to the east. And then, lift the cane from the floor of the cellar. Then, take a trip north. Once you do that, put the cane on the couch. Alright, thanks!

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a bar. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You see a couch. The couch is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the couch you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty.[end if] Look over there! a bed stand. [if there is something on the s_1]On the bed stand you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a mantle. [if there is something on the s_2]On the mantle you can see [a list of things on the s_2]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You scan the room for a stand, and you find a stand. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
Ah, the kitchenette. This is some kind of kitchenette, really great normal vibes in this place, a wonderful normal atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Canadian limited edition safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The Canadian limited edition safe contains [a list of things in the c_0]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You are in an attic. A typical kind of place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out a counter. You shudder, but continue examining the counter. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You are in a laundry place. A typical one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can make out a table. The table is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_5] On the table you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in a cubicle.



There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a bedchamber.

 You make out a basket.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The basket is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. A normal one.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a spare room. An usual kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You arrive in a studio. A normal kind of place.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You've entered a lounge.

 You see a bench. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]The bench appears to be empty. What's the point of an empty bench?[end if] You can make out a bed. You wonder idly who left that here. The bed is typical.[if there is something on the s_7] On the bed you can make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've entered a closet. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a rack. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the rack.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a workshop. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a desk. [if there is something on the s_9]On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a shower. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You are in a parlor. A typical one.

 [if c_3 is locked]A locked[else if c_3 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] suitcase is in the corner.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a bookshelf. The bookshelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_10] On the bookshelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a shelf. [if there is something on the s_11]You see [a list of things on the s_11] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]The shelf appears to be empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a scullery. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You make out a platter. The platter is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_12] On the platter you see [a list of things on the s_12].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_12] But the thing is empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a study.

 You can see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] toolbox.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_4]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The toolbox is empty, what a horrible day![end if] As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a trunk. Now that's what I call TextWorld![if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_13]You see [a list of things on the s_13] on the mantelpiece. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_13]However, the mantelpiece, like an empty mantelpiece, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchen.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a cellar like it isn't some huge deal.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a garage. An ordinary one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You see [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a locker.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
Ah, the pantry. This is some kind of pantry, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



There is an unguarded exit to the south.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to make an effort to go south. And then, make an effort to venture south. And then, make an effort to travel west. And then, make an effort to take a trip north. And then, go to the north. After that, head north. That done, try to move east. And then, pick up the cane from the floor of the cellar. And then, go north. Then, sit the cane on the couch. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
